backend/main.mo: Defines core competition, profile, payment, and result types along with comparison utilities for ordering events and user-event tuples.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking inspection-time penalty fix to specific frontend files and components with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, pages, and hooks across the app.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, defining shared UI colors and borders.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML wrapper that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/env.json: Contains backend canister ID configuration for the frontend.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Stores Razorpay payment configuration including keyId, currency, and UI theme.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Manual QA checklist covering authentication, admin access, competition creation, leaderboards, and user-management regression tests.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Normalizes backend and network errors into user-friendly messages for competitions, sessions, payments, and authorization.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines reusable React Query cache keys for competitions, profiles, admin data, and solve sessions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes React Router, route tree, query client, and wraps the app with theme and query providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: UI component for selecting and editing different competition fee structures and emitting FeeMode updates.
Protects admin-only pages by checking authentication and admin status, showing loading or denial screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content requiring authentication and displays a login prompt when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Displays a competition summary card with status, dates, event count, and navigation to the competition page.
Main application layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table computing Ao5 from results and linking competitors to their public profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays user payment history with loading, error, and empty states, sorting payments by date.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Provides a dropdown menu showing user profile info and navigation options with logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for creating a user profile by submitting email and display name.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15‑second inspection countdown with optional scramble reveal before solving.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Shows a completion screen after all solves with navigation options and video submission instructions.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Runs a solve timer with start/stop controls and reports the measured time to the parent.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays an error message for failed backend initialization with retry guidance.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay payment configuration from a JSON file with cached fallback defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a beforeunload handler to warn users before leaving the page when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile using the active backend actor, syncing loading state with actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages multi‑step deployment simulation state, including progress updates, diagnostics, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines numerous data‑fetching and mutation hooks using the backend actor, plus helpers for mapping backend types.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Computes average‑of‑5 solve times with DNF handling and defines leaderboard entry types.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Determines whether competitions are paid and formats fee information for display.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Generates and downloads CSV files, including specialized export for competition results.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into human‑readable date and datetime strings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates a multi‑step deployment process with random failures and provides utilities for generating and normalizing deployment error messages.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for environment files, payment config, network access, and build artifacts, returning all detected failures.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads the Razorpay checkout script and opens the payment widget using config and order details, returning the payment result.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Manages tab‑scoped solve session tokens in sessionStorage, including storing, retrieving, checking, and clearing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into a seconds.milliseconds string or returns DNF for invalid values.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Lists all competitions for admins with actions to create, edit, delete, lock/unlock, and activate/deactivate them.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Provides a form for admins to create a new competition, including events, scrambles, dates, limits, and fee configuration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Loads an existing competition for editing and lets admins modify details, events, scrambles, status, and fees.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs and displays deployment preflight checks and step‑by‑step progress for going live to production.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Shows the admin dashboard with navigation to management sections and quick actions like creating competitions or deploying.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Allows admins to filter, view, export, and toggle visibility of competition results by competition and event.
Admin page that lists all users and provides actions to block, delete, reset competition status, and view solve history via various admin API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting or resuming competition sessions.
Fetches competitions and renders running, upcoming, and completed lists with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a competition leaderboard with event selection, ranking icons, AO5 calculation, and navigation to competitor profiles.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status indicators and links to their leaderboards, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides an authenticated user's profile editor with display name, country, gender fields, and a payments tab.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Shows a public competitor profile with basic info and aggregated event results stats.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the full solve flow including inspection, timing, penalties, scramble fetching, and result submission.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Defines admin-specific TypeScript types for result inputs, public profile info, and user summaries.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Extends backend-generated types with additional competition, result, leaderboard, and session-related interfaces not included in the generated API.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, a complete event list, and the default event used throughout the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the platform’s features, architecture, known issues, and development state.
